column4: Such wisdom by Dr. Gloria Ladson-Billings!  #PushTheRock - the struggle makes us stronger: we need to move away from the mindset of winning, but instead of the mindset of the struggle.  #EducationDebt (instead of the "achievement gap")  üôè@gjladson https://t.co/ZosCy7Givi https://t.co/qittw5j9w2
